price: 74. They have not estimated Allâh His Rightful Estimate. Verily, Allâh is All-Strong, All-Mighty.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
